credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
title: Vase
description: Red clay body, cast.  Cylindrical body swelling at shoulder with slightly raised rim; no foot.  Incised decoration of three upright peacock feathers with green "eyes" encircle the shoulder, stems extend to base; very stylized.  Body shading from dark brown to burnt-orange at shoulder.  Allover orange glaze with fine aventurine effects.  Bottom glazed; foot rim not glazed.
name: Vase
